quotes.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
The eye through which I see God is the same eye through which God sees me; my eye and God's eye are one eye, one seeing, one knowing, one love.
The beauty of a woman must be seen from in her eyes, because that is the doorway to her heart, the place where love resides.
It is often said that before you die your life passes before your eyes. It is in fact true. It's called living.
If I can see pain in your eyes then share with me your tears. If I can see joy in your eyes then share with me your smile.
When a woman is talking to you, listen to what she says with her eyes.
The eye sees a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination awake.
For I dipped into the future, far as human eye could see, Saw the vision of the world, and all the wonder that would be

A gray eye is a sly eye, And roguish is a brown one; Turn full upon me thy eye,-- Ah, how its wavelets drown one! A blue eye is a true eye; Mysterious is a dark one, Which flashes like a spark-sun! A black eye is the best one.
The ear tends to be lazy, craves the familiar and is shocked by the unexpected; the eye, on the other hand, tends to be impatient, craves the novel and is bored by repetition.
They seemed to be staring at the dark, but their eyes were watching God
Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them.
Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
Open your eyes, look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
The soul, fortunately, has an interpreter - often an unconscious but still a faithful interpreter - in the eye.

Here was an ugly little girl asking for beauty....A little black girl who wanted to rise up out of the pit of her blackness and see the world with blue eyes. His outrage grew and felt like power. For the first time he honestly wished he could work miracles.

The eyes of Doctor T. J. Eckleburg are blue and gigantic—their irises are one yard high. They look out of no face, but, instead, from a pair of enormous yellow spectacles which pass over a nonexistent nose. Evidently some wild wag of an oculist set them there to fatten his practice in the borough of Queens, and then sank down himself into eternal blindness, or forgot them and moved away. But his eyes, dimmed a little by many paintless days, under sun and rain, brood on over the solemn dumping ground.
The eyes are one of the most powerful tools a woman can have. With one look, she can relay the most intimate message. After the connection is made, words cease to exist.
The eye is the jewel of the body.
The world only exists in your eyes. You can make it as big or as small as you want..
Those true eyes Too pure and too honest in aught to disguise The sweet soul shining through them
I shut my eyes and all the world drops dead; I lift my eyes and all is born again.
Every closed eye is not sleeping, and every open eye is not seeing.
A woman's eyes cut deeper than a knife.
The eyes like sentinel occupy the highest place in the body.
The eyes indicate the antiquity of the soul.
The eyes see only what the mind is prepared to comprehend.
If your eyes dwell in your heart; then your inner voice will be your congenial Guide.
Shut your eyes and see.
His eyes have made love to me all evening.
My eyes make pictures when they are shut.
i am a museum full of art but you had your eyes shut
For she had eyes and chose me.
the intensity / in your eyes / burns my pen / as i write.
An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language
No one knows what it's like / To be the bad man / To be the sad man / Behind blue eyes
She'll tease you / She'll unease you / Just to please you / She's got Bette Davis eyes
Drink to me only with thine eyes, / And I will pledge with mine;
Mine eye and heart are at a mortal war, / How to divide the conquest of thy sight; / Mine eye my heart thy picture’s sight would bar, / My heart mine eye the freedom of that right.
Eyes are the window to the soul.
Cat's eyes seem a bridge to a world beyond the one we know.
For the eyes are the signs of the soul within, / Of the heart that is leal and true, / And, my own sweetheart, I shall love you still, / Just as long as your eyes are blue.
Our eyes are full of terrible confessions.
Open your eyes and see what you can with them before they close forever.
Eyes – the head’s chief of police. They watch and make mental notes.
There's a light in a woman's eyes that speaks louder than words.
It is in their eyes that their magic resides.
When your eyes drooped before mine eyes, / As though some secret made them wise, / Some wisdom veiled them secretly, / I knew your heart began to be / In love with love, in love with me.
When your eyes opened to mine eyes, / Without desire, without surprise, / I knew your soul awoke to see / All, dreams foretold, but could not be, / Yet loving me, not loving me.
Through the eyes of the brave, the future makes past tense perfect sense.
Look at their eyes. If their eyes are shining, you know youre doing it.
Your eyes are like two jewels in the sky.
Fix your eyes on what you believe and not what you see.
The sexiest part of the body is the eyes. That's what I believe.
To see through my eyes you first have to know me. / Most little girls have a mommy and lots of love.
If you close your eyes to see the view, you miss everything surrounding you.
love is in the eyes, and one woman knows when another woman is in love.
Eyes on eyes, I thought you taught me / Don't get caught too tied to eyes / Eyes that frequently do cross me / Wake me up, I want your type
You are most beautiful when your eyes are glowing with kindness and joy.
The voice of your eyes is deeper than all roses.
My madness // See in the eyes // My love's truth // See in the eyes
Beautiful eyes are those that show the beautiful thoughts that burn below.
The eyes are the windows of a woman's heart; you may enter that a way!
The eyes have one language everywhere.
When the tongue lies, the eyes tell the truth.
Eyes that have never wept cannot comprehend sorrow.
Eyes are more accurate witnesses than ears.
People who shut their eyes to reality simply invite their own destruction.
Over the eyes of gladness / The lids of sorrow fall, / And the light of mirth is darkened / Under the funeral pall.
If your eyes are blinded with your worries, you cannot see the beauty of the sunset.
Eyes raised toward heaven are always beautiful, whatever they be.
The worldling's eyes are dusty dim, / The eyes of sin are weary and cold, / The fighting boy brings home with him / The unsullied eyes of old.
The eyes see everything through the heart.
Our eyes are always blind when they view the future.
If my eyes could show my soul, everyone would cry when they saw me smile.
Through the eyes of a child, —is your heart then set free
He who closes his eyes sees nothing, even in the full light of day.
You can tell a lot from someone's eyes.
There are many things that can only be seen through eyes that have cried.
The eyes are hungry but often satiated before they see.

The curve of your eyes embraces my heart / A ring of sweetness and dance / halo of time, sure nocturnal cradle, / And if I no longer know all I have lived through / It’s that your eyes have not always been mine.
Your eyes show the strength of your soul.
If we could see through each other's eyes you'd be surprise by the many things you may see, things you could never imagine and things you thought could never be.
The eyes are not responsible when the mind does the seeing.
The eyes see not what is before them when the mind is intent on other matters.
Many eyes go through the meadow, but few see the flowers in it.
Children listen best with their eyes. What you do is what they hear.
Your eyes are even smaller, yet they behold the world.

quotes.cite: Ryan Raddon, Finn Bjarrnson and John Hancock
quotes.quote: Look into my eyes / Eyes are the windows to the soul / Look into my eyes / Eyes, oh you will know / There is no surprise / Eyes, because love is plain to see / Look into my eyes
You believe what your eyes want to believe!
Eyes will not see when the heart wishes them to be blind.
The eyes are the pioneers that first announce the soft tale of love.
The eyes are black and beautiful complexion fair and sweet.
The eyes of men love to pluck the blossoms from the faded flowers they turn away.
The eyes are the landing strip to the heart.
You can close your eyes to reality but not to memories.
When you close your eyes to tragedy, you close your eyes to greatness.
If you see the sun in my eyes / It should be as no surprise / It's the light of love inside of me / Now tell me what do you see
Eyes so transparent that through them the soul is seen.
Look deep inside the eyes of a woman, see the man you want to be.
When the eyes of the flesh are shut, the eyes of the spirit are open.
The eyes of our souls only then begin to see when our bodily eyes are closing.
A lover's eyes will gaze an eagle blind.
